org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.fluid

Class ImplicitFluidConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.fluid.ImplicitFluidConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BloodFluidConverter

    public class ImplicitFluidConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    An implicit converter for changing fluid types with a conversion rate.

    • Constructor Summary

      • addConverter

        public void addConverter(net.minecraft.fluid.Fluid fluid,
                         double rate)
        Add a fluid converter.
        Parameters:
        fluid - The fluid to convert to.
        rate - The rate of conversion that will be multiplied with every conversion.

      • canConvert

        public boolean canConvert(net.minecraft.fluid.Fluid fluid)
        If the given fluid can be converter.
        Parameters:
        fluid - The fluid to convert.
        Returns:
        If it can be converted.

      • convert

        public net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack convert(net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack fluid)
        Convert the given fluid to the target fluid.
        Parameters:
        fluid - The fluid stack to convert from.
        Returns:
        The converted fluid stack.

      • convertReverse

        public net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack convertReverse(net.minecraft.fluid.Fluid target,
                                                           net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack fluid)
        Convert the given fluid from target fluid to the given fluid.
        Parameters:
        target - The fluid to convert to.
        fluid - The fluid stack to convert, it must be of the same fluid type of the main target of this converter instance.
        Returns:
        The converted fluid stack.

        public void registerFromConfig(java.lang.String[] config)
        Register the converters config from the given string array.
        Parameters:
        config - The config where each element is in the form 'fluidname:ratio'.
